title: ammA paradEvi
sahitya:
ammA paradEvi un anbE enakkAvi


anupallavi

  immAniDa vESattai Endiya shAntamE


caraNam 1    punnakai vAi tirappAi ennuL un bOdha veLLam surappAi
innal iDargaLait-tavirppAi ammA inba varangaLellAm koDuppAi
    caraNam 2    tannalavaghandaiyai azhippAi mana cancalap-pEyinai ozhippAi
un kula makkaLAi ulagellAm vAzhndiDum oTrumai nATTiDa naTrava shaktiyaruL
